error.message: Class Drupal\user_email_verification\Event\UserEmailVerificationBlockAccountEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead
